creditline: Gift of Gerald Ray Nelson and Joanne Hogan Nelson
description: recto: lady, looking down toward PL, seen 3/4 from PL side, wearing tall white cap with a sun-like emblem on the side, white blouse with a wide, fluffy collar, and a long flowing skirt with scroll pattern; heavy draperies around and above woman; verso: woman with long black hair wearing a crown labeled "FORTUNE" riding a white horse through a fanciful landscape with elves and personified trees; unfinished--top of drawing may be missing
medium: Pen and ink and graphite on card
provenance: The artist; his stepdaughter, Joanie Nelson, Vancouver, WA
title: Untitled, recto and verso [lady wearing tall cap and scroll-patterned skirt, recto; "Fortune" riding on a horse with elves and personified trees, verso]
